text:
Financial Management Determination 2019

I make the following determination under section 6(7)(a) of the Financial Management Act 2016 .

29 May 2019

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

1. Short title
    This determination may be cited as the Financial Management Determination 2019 .

2. Commencement
    This determination takes effect on the day on which the Financial Management Act 2016 commences.

3. Financial management provisions of certain Agencies are not suspended
    The provisions, in the following Acts, in respect of the financial management of the Agencies to which the Acts relate, are not suspended:
            (a) Fire Service Act 1979 ;
            (b) Inland Fisheries Act 1995 ;
            (c) Marine and Safety Authority Act 1997 ;
            (d) Royal Tasmanian Botanical Gardens Act 2002 ;
            (e) Tasmanian Development Act 1983 ;
            (f) Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery Act 2017 ;
            (g) TasTAFE (Skills and Training Business) Act 2021 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 June 2019

This determination is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
